general_advisory: Farmers are advised to conduct harvesting, sowing, and spraying operations accordingly. Make provision to take proper care of crops and animals to protect them from the cold. Complete the sowing of Rabi crops like Mustard, Til, Chickpea, Groundnut, Green gram/Black Gram, etc. Start nursery sowing of Summer Paddy where irrigation facilities are available.

advisory: Wait for harvesting operations due to expected rainfall
Use 'Super Grain Bag' or proper storage methods for harvested paddy
Start field preparation for summer rice cultivation
Monitor for sucking insect attack in groundnut crop
Take necessary actions for insect control and management
Use straw as mulching material in vegetable crops
Monitor and control Diamond back moth in cauliflower
Ensure clean drinking water and clean sheds for livestock
Vaccination and deworming for disease control
Ensure proper ventilation and fresh air for poultry
Provide external heat source for warmth and insulation
